title: Admission in Government Unani or Ayurvedic Medical College and Homoeopathic Medical College.
author: Md Alauddin
description: The DGHS is one of the agencies of the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare of Bangladesh. DGHS stands for Directorate General of Health Services
cleaned_text: - Discussion on the occasion of the birth centenary of the great architect of independence Father of the Nation Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman and National Children's Day-2021 - Hon'ble Prime Minister, Government of The People's Republic of Bangladesh Sheikh Hasina visited the ministry of Health and Family Welfare - Covid-19 Health Bulletin 2020 Wrapping Unveiling Ceremony - Hon'ble Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina, Mother of Humanity, visiting Forcibly Displaced Myanmar Nationals (FDMNs) at Kutupalong camp, Ukhiya . - Honorable Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina is receiving ICT Sustainable Development Award from International Telecommunication Union (ITU) Secretary General Houlin Zhao at the UN Headquarters in New York, 2015 - Honorable Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina is receiving Champions of The Earth award, 2015 - Honorable Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina is receiving UN award for MDG achievement, 2010 - Honorable Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina is receiving award form International Telecommunication Union (ITU) Secretary General, 2011 - ICT Adviser Sajib Wazed Joy is receiving Innovative Policy awards, 2014 on behalf of Honorable Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina [Dial 16263.
